__e: You have worn out your welcome, sir!
"I could of told you before that she was no good - like all females!"
It means be advised that I'm mean, nasty and tired.
"But if you mess with me, be warned you're asking for trouble."
You're well aware that my mission gives me the power of command.
You were told there is no return.
You're well aware that my mission gives me the power of command.
I don't know how you pulled this off... but I can't be kept in the dark on something like this.
All I said was that I noticed a man with a dark raincoat walking away from the building.
You have been warned to look out for a certain man.
But they can't stay there, because John's got his notice to get off.
If one of us did that, he wouldn't hang around waiting for the other two to figure it out. But he'd have to.
Your side was notified about this movement.
Would you like to be informed about this and to recieve other informations?
I've told you about him, haven't I?
You could have least told me in advance.
Would you like to be warned before the situation gets out of hand?
Why wasn't I told this before? !
If he'd had any brains, he'd have given us time to think about it.
We better get out of here. He may have the cops on us already...
Honey... In case no one told you, the party's moved inside due to the bad weather.
